Text: Sorry for the temporary lack of seed, the youngin unplugged the file server and it took 4 HOURS!!! to complete the RAID checks and verify all data was ok... Sucked, but now all is well, the torrent is checking and will be seeding any moment.

Come on guys! Seed at least until there is more than ONE SEEDER!! Or at least 1.0 ratio!
